doc.title: Huffington Post launches in Italy
doc.author: Roy Greenslade
doc.description: New site opens with Silvio Berlusconi interview

main.p: The Huffington Post has launched an Italian site today, L'Huffington Post, in partnership with Gruppo Espresso, a media conglomerate based in Rome. It kicks off an interview with Silvio Berlusconi.
The site is edited by Lucia Annunziata who has previously worked for two leading Italian newspapers, la Repubblica and Corriere della Sera.
L'Huffington Post follows the launch of HuffPo editions in the Britain, Canada, France and Spain.
HuffPo founder, Arianna Huffington, promises that l'HuffPost "will celebrate Italy's vibrant culture, from its cuisine, operas, and art to its traditions, ancient history and legendary cities."
